title: Comprehensive Test Validation System
description: Build an integrated testing system that automatically validates code quality, functionality, and performance across multiple test layers to ensure reliable software delivery.
iWant: a comprehensive test validation system that covers all code changes
soThat: I can confidently deploy code knowing it meets quality standards and functional requirements
acceptanceCriteria: System runs unit tests with minimum 85% code coverage
Integration tests validate API endpoints and data flow
Performance tests ensure response times under 500ms
Test reports show detailed results with pass/fail metrics
